description: Stylesheet for theme management and layout of the Tic Tac Toe web application, including light and dark themes.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container that centers content and handles theme-based background and text colors.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Class for handling the logo of the application with animation when preferred motion is not reduced.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application, styled with flexbox for centering and responsive design.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application to match the theme's secondary text color.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes, with interactive styles for hover and active states.
